item.title: 上周的市场波动冲击还有更大的空间
item.description:
拥挤的交易、稀少的成交量意味着股票和债券的狂飙Crowded trades, thin volume mean a wild ride in stocks and bonds

】

item.title: 星巴克即将与埃利奥特达成董事会席位协议
item.description: 熟悉此事的人士透露，星巴克公司正在与埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）商讨一项解决方案，让这位激进投资者在星巴克连锁咖啡店董事会中担任代表。【原文：Starbucks Corp. is discussing a settlement with Elliott Investment Management that would give the activist investor representation on the board of the coffee shop chain, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 博茨瓦纳电力公司将 100 兆瓦太阳能项目授予中国集团
item.description: 以中国港湾工程有限责任公司（China Harbour Engineering Co. Ltd.）为首的一批中国公司赢得了在博茨瓦纳建造一座 100 兆瓦太阳能发电厂的合同，这是该国第二座公用事业规模的可再生能源设施。【原文：A group of Chinese companies led by China Harbour Engineering Co. has won a contract to build a 100-megawatt solar plant in Botswana, the country’s second utility-scale renewables facility.】

item.title: 礼来利用蓝筹债券市场为收购 Morphic 提供资金
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.）周一将出售美国投资级债券，为其32亿美元收购肠道药物制造商Morphic Holding Inc.提供资金，此前经济衰退的担忧引发了本周的动荡。【原文：Eli Lilly & Co. is selling US investment-grade bonds on Monday to fund its $3.2 billion acquisition of gut-drug maker Morphic Holding Inc., after recession fears triggered a turbulent week.】

item.title: 小盘股 ETF 损失数十亿美元，股票大轮换泡汤
item.description: 被誉为华尔街向小型公司大举进军的行动，就像它开始时一样，很快就陷入了停滞。【原文：What had been touted as Wall Street’s big rotation into smaller firms sputtered just as quickly as it started.】

item.title: 瑞典奥斯卡地产公司与债权人达成协议避免破产
item.description: 瑞典房东 Oscar Properties Holding AB 在与寻求对公司进行破产索赔的债权人之一达成和解后，避免了破产。【原文：Swedish landlord Oscar Properties Holding AB has averted insolvency after it reached a settlement with one of the creditors seeking a bankruptcy claim against the company.】

item.title: 夏威夷电力公司发布濒危警告后暴跌
item.description: 夏威夷电气工业公司（Hawaiian Electric Industries Inc.【原文：Hawaiian Electric Industries Inc. plunged the most in almost a year after issuing a going-concern warning.】

item.title: 欧洲秋季首次公开募股计划有望抵御波动性飙升
item.description: 银行家们表示，股票市场的突然动荡尚未吓倒少数几家正准备 9 月份在欧洲上市的发行商，但在这个波涛汹涌的市场上，高端定价可能难以实现。【原文：A sudden wobble in equity markets has not yet deterred the handful of issuers working on September listings in Europe, bankers say, but top-end pricing may prove elusive in this choppy market.】

item.title: 高盛交易台看到了买入股票的短暂机会
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）的斯科特-鲁布纳（Scott Rubner）表示，随着系统性基金的抛售压力减轻，同时企业加大股票回购力度，投资者将在本月底迎来一个短暂的窗口期，买入跌势中的美股。【原文：Investors will have a brief window to buy the dip in US stocks at the end of this month as selling pressure from systematic funds eases while companies boost share buybacks, according to Scott Rubner at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 瑞典倾向于为新核反应堆提供捷克式资助
item.description: 瑞典正在考虑类似于捷克共和国新建核反应堆的融资方案，以帮助支付未来几十年新建核反应堆的费用。【原文：Sweden is considering financing options similar to those used for a new nuclear reactor in the Czech Republic to help pay for a new fleet of nuclear reactors in the coming decades.】

item.title: Zillow 称，随着建筑热潮缓解了供应，美国租房者获得了福利
item.description: 据 Zillow 公司最新发表的一篇博文称，美国租房者在签订新合同时赢得了优惠，这表明公寓建设的激增正在缓解供应紧张。【原文：US renters are winning concessions when they sign new contracts, an indication that surging apartment construction is easing the supply squeeze, according to a new blog post from Zillow.】

item.title: 供应担忧加剧，欧洲天然气交易商急于购买保护措施
item.description: 交易商们急于抢购欧洲天然气价格飙升的保护措施，这表明他们预计，在距离供暖季节不到两个月的时间里，天然气供应将受到更多干扰。【原文：Traders rushed to snap up protection against surging European gas prices, signaling they expect more disruption to supplies with the heating season less than two months away.】

item.title: 上市热潮能否让伦敦股市摆脱困境？
item.description: 几家大公司正在考虑在伦敦上市的可能性，其中包括矿业公司英美铂金有限公司、香港企业集团长江基建控股有限公司和中国快速时尚巨头申银万国。上市热潮表明，在经历了多年的低迷之后，英国股市的命运可能正在好转。新一届工党政府努力将更多英国养老基金资金引入本地股票，这可能会有所帮助。但市场规模仍远小于 2.【原文：Several big companies are looking at potential London share listings, including miner Anglo American Platinum Ltd., Hong Kong conglomerate CK Infrastructure Holdings Ltd. and Chinese fast-fashion giant Shein. The flurry of interest suggests the UK stock market’s fortunes may be improving after many years of depressed activity. An effort by the new Labour government to channel more British pension fund money into local stocks may help. But the market is still much smaller than it was before the 2】

item.title: LL Flooring 申请破产，打算出售零售店
item.description: LL Flooring Holdings Inc. 前身为 Lumber Liquidators，已申请破产保护，关闭了几家门店，并试图出售其余分店。【原文：LL Flooring Holdings Inc., formerly called Lumber Liquidators, has filed Chapter 11 to close several stores while attempting to sell its remaining locations.】

item.title: Adnoc 零售部门在扩张计划中寻找投资负责人
item.description: Adnoc Distribution 正在招聘一名首席投资官，这家阿拉伯联合酋长国最大石油公司的零售部门正在寻求全球扩张。【原文：Adnoc Distribution is looking to hire a chief investment officer as the retail arm of the biggest oil company in the United Arab Emirates seeks to expand globally.】

item.title: 地区紧张局势加剧，埃及寻求锁定小麦供应
item.description: 埃及正在考虑提前长达八个月的小麦供应报价，因为埃及希望利用小麦价格下跌的机会，获得其每年近三分之一的主粮需求量。【原文：Egypt is considering offers for wheat supplies as far as eight months in advance, as it seeks to take advantage of a dip in wheat prices to secure nearly a third of its annual requirements of the staple grain.】

item.title: Janus Henderson 将收购胜利公园，扩大私人信贷规模
item.description: Janus Henderson Group Plc 已同意收购 Victory Park Capital Advisors，以拓展快速增长的私人信贷市场，尤其是基于资产的融资。【原文：Janus Henderson Group Plc has agreed to buy Victory Park Capital Advisors in a bid to expand in the fast-growing private credit market, particularly asset-based finance.】

item.title: B.莱利因风险披露和与卡恩的关系面临更广泛的美国调查
item.description: B.莱利金融公司（B. Riley Financial Inc. ）面临的美国调查范围不断扩大，调查对象是该公司是否在连续亏损和股价下挫的情况下向投资者准确描述了其财务健康状况。【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc. faces a widening US investigation into whether it gave investors an accurate picture of its financial health amid a string of losses and a sagging stock price.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称，风险犹存，波兰货币政策必须保持谨慎
item.description: 国际货币基金组织驻东欧高级代表表示，由于工资增长的潜力会对物价造成压力，波兰在恢复降息之前应谨慎行事。【原文：Poland should be cautious before returning to interest-rate cuts as the potential for wage growth creates pressure on prices, the International Monetary Fund’s senior representative in eastern Europe said.】

item.title: 印度通胀率自 2019 年以来首次低于印度央行目标值
item.description: 印度的通货膨胀率在近五年来首次降至央行的目标值以下，但由于政策制定者希望看到物价持续下降，目前还不太可能刺激降息。【原文：India’s inflation eased below the central bank’s target for the first time in almost five years, though it is unlikely to spur interest rate cuts just yet as policymakers want to see a sustained decline in prices.】

item.title: 大型科技股、医疗保健股和高收益股是逢低买入目标
item.description: 八月伊始，美国股市因经济动荡、盈利乏力和全球日元套利交易平仓而遭受重创，这让华尔街开始寻找可能受到不公平惩罚的市场角落。【原文：A dizzying start to August, which saw US stocks whiplashed by economic jitters, lackluster earnings and the unwinding of the global yen carry trade, has left Wall Street searching for corners of the market that may have been unfairly punished.】

item.title: 国家发出降低利率信号，肯尼亚最大银行将增加贷款
item.description: 肯尼亚市值最大的银行 Equity Group Holdings Plc 计划在下半年将其国内市场的贷款增加多达 5%，此前政府已表示计划降低利率。【原文：Equity Group Holdings Plc, Kenya’s biggest bank by market value, plans to increase lending by as much as 5% in its home market in the second half of the year, after the government signaled plans to reduce interest rates.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行前首席财务官称自己曾是首席执行官候选人，后因关系问题被银行解雇
item.description: 纳迪娜-安（Nadine Ahn）说，在因与同事的私人关系而被解雇之前，她曾有机会成为第一位管理加拿大皇家银行的女性。【原文：Nadine Ahn says she had a chance to become the first woman to run Royal Bank of Canada before she was fired over a personal relationship with a colleague.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空启动以忠诚度计划为支撑的 27.5 亿美元债务出售计划
item.description: 捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways Corp. ）在其忠诚度计划的支持下，启动了价值 27.5 亿美元的债券和贷款销售，以筹集储备金和一般企业用途资金。【原文：JetBlue Airways Corp. has kicked off a $2.75 billion bond-and-loan sale backed by its loyalty program as the carrier seeks to raise reserves and fund general corporate purposes.】

item.title: 电气石公司将以 9.47 亿美元全股票交易收购 Crew 能源公司
item.description: 加拿大最大的天然气钻探公司电气石石油公司（Tourmaline Oil Corp.）同意以 13 亿加元（9.47 亿美元）（包括债务）收购 Crew Energy Inc.【原文：Canada’s biggest gas driller Tourmaline Oil Corp. agreed to buy Crew Energy Inc. for C$1.3 billion ($947 million), including debt, as consolidation continues in the oil and gas industry.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气忧虑情绪席卷欧洲恐惧市场
item.description:
乌克兰的越境入侵再次令本已担心过境协议到期的贸易商感到震惊。【原文：

Ukraine’s cross-border incursion triggers another jolt for traders already concerned about the expiration of a transit deal.

】

item.title: 维旺迪 Canal+ 增持毛里求斯付费电视公司股份
item.description: 维旺迪公司（Vivendi SE）旗下的 Canal+ 计划将其在 MC Vision 的股份增加一倍，从而成为这家总部位于毛里求斯的数字付费电视公司的大股东，因为这家法国公司正努力提升其在非洲大陆的影响力。【原文：Vivendi SE’s Canal+ plans to double its stake in MC Vision to become the majority shareholder of the Mauritian-based digital Pay-TV company, as the French firm seeks to boost its presence on the continent.】

item.title: 德拉希退出英国电信后，所持股份价值下降 13 亿美元
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）的计算，帕特里克-德拉希（Patrick Drahi）正在退出他对英国电信公司英国电信集团（BT Group Plc）的投资，因为他所持股份的价值下降了约 9.909 亿英镑（约合 12.6 亿美元）。【原文：Patrick Drahi is bailing out of his investment in UK telecom company BT Group Plc after his stake declined in value by about £990.9 million pounds ($1.26 billion), according to calculations by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 中国监管机构要求部分农村银行放弃债券交易
item.description: 监管机构通知中国江西省的商业银行不要结清其购买的政府债券，采取了一些最极端的措施来冷却令中国政府震惊的市场涨势。【原文：Regulators told commercial banks in China’s Jiangxi province not to settle their purchases of government bonds, taking some of the most extreme measures yet to cool a market rally that has alarmed Beijing.】

item.title: 安联支持的绿色氢能开发商押宝巴西
item.description: 由安联资本（Allianz Capital Partners）支持的一家挪威可再生能源公司正瞄准巴西的一个绿色氢气项目。【原文：A Norwegian renewable energy company backed by Allianz Capital Partners is targeting a green hydrogen project in Brazil.】
